name: Breakpoint Digital
tag_list: sales, business-development, strategy, product, planning, revenue, metrics
overview:
Breakpoint helps companies of every size and description achieve their business and revenue goals. We are expert at creating and implementing strategies that build businesses, monetize content, attract audiences and expand products and services into new markets. Emerging companies retain Breakpoint to refine and execute on business plans, initiate strategic partnerships and close mission-critical deals.

Established companies work with Breakpoint to plan, jump-start and execute digital initiatives that enhance the reach and effectiveness of their own business development, marketing and sales efforts. Breakpoint has direct access to a vast network of high-level decision-makers, best-in-class service providers and trusted experts across every aspect of digital business.
